inclusion.criterion: age between birth and 9 months at the time of recruitment
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: diagnosis of congenital muscular torticollis as documented in the medical record
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: other types of torticollis, such as neuromuscular torticollis, Sandifer syndrome,
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: being seen for torticollis by another health care provider
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer and is experiencing worsening dysphagia, poor oral intake, weight loss, and lethargy. They have undergone multiple treatments including XRT and RAI ablation.
